title: O. Social Media Features and Widgets
content: Our website may include social media features, such as the LinkedIn button and other sharing widgets, which may collect your IP address, record the pages you visit on our site and place cookies to enable these features to function properly.
These social media features and widgets may be hosted either by third-party providers or directly on our website.
If you interact with features hosted by third parties, those providers may collect information indicating that you have visited our website.
Your interactions with these features are governed by the privacy policies of the respective third-party providers.
